quotes.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Let your light so shine before men.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.text: A cheerful heart is good medicine.
quotes.author: King Solomon

quotes.text: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
quotes.author: King Solomon

quotes.text: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss
